title: How to Draw Finn from Adventure Time

steps.title: Draw a slanted rectangle to represent Finn's body.
steps.content: Draw a slanted rectangle to represent Finn's body.

steps.title: Add two small curved lines on each side of the upper part of the body.
steps.content: Add two small curved lines on each side of the upper part of the body.

steps.title: Attach four limbs for the hands and legs.
steps.content: Attach four limbs for the hands and legs.

steps.title: Draw curved lines on the back and front to make a backpack.
steps.content: Draw curved lines on the back and front to make a backpack.

steps.title: Draw an outline of a sword on one of Finn's hand.
steps.content: Draw an outline of a sword on one of Finn's hand.

steps.title: Draw a circle and add details to make Finn's face.
steps.content: Draw a circle and add details to make Finn's face.

steps.title: Use a marker to highlight desired lines.
steps.content: Use a marker to highlight desired lines.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary ones.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary ones.

steps.title: Add color as desired.
steps.content: Add color as desired.

steps.title: Draw circular rectangle for the body and head of Finn.
steps.content: Draw circular rectangle for the body and head of Finn.

steps.title: Draw an oval inside the circular rectangle for Finn's face.
steps.content: Draw an oval inside the circular rectangle for Finn's face.

steps.title: Draw curves for is headgear design and backpack.
steps.content: Draw curves for is headgear design and backpack.

steps.title: Draw 4 curves with ovals attached to the edges for his hands and feet .
steps.content: Draw 4 curves with ovals attached to the edges for his hands and feet .

steps.title: Draw a rectangle with a sharp edge attached to a rectangular handle and a circle for his sword.
steps.content: Draw a rectangle with a sharp edge attached to a rectangular handle and a circle for his sword.

steps.title: Draw Finn's face, don't forget to add two circular teeth inside his mouth.
steps.content: Draw Finn's face, don't forget to add two circular teeth inside his mouth.

steps.title: Based on the outline, draw Finn's entire body .
steps.content: Based on the outline, draw Finn's entire body .

steps.title: Add further details to Finn.
steps.content: Add further details to Finn.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color Finn!
steps.content: Color Finn!

steps.title: Draw circular rectangle for the body and head of Finn.
steps.content: Draw circular rectangle for the body and head of Finn.

steps.title: Draw an oval inside the circular rectangle for Finn's face.
steps.content: Draw an oval inside the circular rectangle for Finn's face.

steps.title: Draw two arcs above his head the headgear design.
steps.content: Draw two arcs above his head the headgear design.

steps.title: Draw an oval for the backpack and his right arm.
steps.content: Draw an oval for the backpack and his right arm.

steps.title: Draw curves for his hands and feet, draw ovals on edges of both feet.
steps.content: Draw curves for his hands and feet, draw ovals on edges of both feet.

steps.title: Draw Finn's face.
steps.content: Draw Finn's face.

steps.title: Complete the body based from the outlines, darken the necessary outlines and draw details.
steps.content: Complete the body based from the outlines, darken the necessary outlines and draw details.

steps.title: Add more details to Finns backpack.
steps.content: Add more details to Finns backpack.

steps.title: Erase the unnecessary outlines.
steps.content: Erase the unnecessary outlines.

steps.title: Color Finn!
steps.content: Color Finn!
